desc: Splits the active editor group and moves the editor into the new group on the left side.
Splits the currently active editor into two, placing the new editor group to the right of the current one.
Splits the currently active editor into two, placing the new editor group above the current one.
Splits the currently active editor into two, placing the new editor group below the current one.
Toggles the layout of editor groups between vertical and horizontal orientation.
Splits the currently active editor into two, within the same editor group.
Toggle between split mode for the active editor.
Toggle between horizontal and vertical layout in the active editor group.
Go back to a single editor for the active file.
Moves the active editor group into a new window.
Copies the current editor group into a new window.
Sets the editor layout to a single column or single editor group.
Arranges the editor layout into two columns.
Arranges the editor layout into three columns.
Arranges the editor layout into two horizontal rows.
Arranges the editor layout into three horizontal rows.
Arranges the editor layout into a two by two grid.
Arranges the editor layout into two rows with the second row to the right.
Arranges the editor layout into two columns with an additional bottom panel.
Toggles the centered layout mode in the editor, which centers the code editor in the window for a more focused coding experience.
